item.title: Death in Venice
item.description: Analysis Meta Being watching Visconti for the first time recently. Decided to record a post on this one because it is more than it seems in many ways. I plan to have this one without spoilers because I like myself to find things in movies and there is no value in being explicit potentially ruining that for somebody. I haven’t read the book. I have checked some comments on the internet.
